title: The Diamond Market And Economy In 2022
itunes:title: The Diamond Market And Economy In 2022
description:
Virginia Drosos, CEO of Signet Jewelers, talks about her company, the diamond industry, and how it’s working through supply chain pressures and Russian sanctions. June Grasso, host of “Bloomberg Law” and “Bloomberg Opinion,” discusses Ketanji Brown Jackson’s SCOTUS nomination hearing. RJ Gallo, Senior Portfolio Manager: Fixed Income and Head of the Municipal Bond Group at Federated Hermes, discusses investing and the economy in 2022. Alicia Diaz with Bloomberg’s TOPLive team discusses the Bloomberg “Big Take” story on the economic pain behind NYC’s reopening. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
